dmca.title: [ABUSE] Attention: Lance Crosby, Chief Operating Officer
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 01, 2006 8:46 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Attention: Lance Crosby, Chief Operating Officer

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Tuesday, January 31,
2006 at
4:00:39 PM and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to
your team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] Attention: Lance Crosby, Chief Operating Officer

MESSAGE BODY:
Re:  Sale of Counterfeit Tiffany Jewelry and Infringement of TIFFANY
Trademarks and Copyright at www.tiffany-on-sale.com (http://70.87.98.34)
(Our
Ref: TFF GER TC-05/03159)
 
PLEASE SEE THE ATTACHED CORRESPONDENCE FROM ANGELA KIM, ESQ. REGARDING THE
ABOVE-REFERENCED MATTER.
 
PLEASE NOTE THAT ALL REPLIES SHOULD BE SENT DIRECTLY TO ANGELA AT
AKIM@FROSSZELNICK.COM.
 
THANK YOU.
______________________________________
Amy Kwak
Assistant to Angela Kim, Esq.
FROSS ZELNICK LEHRMAN & ZISSU, P.C.
866 United Nations Plaza,
New York, New York  10017
Direct Tel: 212-813-8210
Fax: 212-813-5901
 
****************************************************************************
****************************************
The information contained in this E-mail message may be privileged,
confidential, and protected from disclosure.  Any unauthorized use,
printing, copying, disclosure or dissemination of this communication may be
subject to legal restriction or sanction.  If you think that you have
received this E-mail message in error, please reply to the sender.
****************************************************************************
******************************************
